Potion, common
When you drink this potion, you transform into a black-feathered @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.tI2hsbBl6skqEkOp]{owl} for 1 hour. This effect works like the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.izAYjuiXEYPJat3R]{polymorph} spell, except you can take only the form of an @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.tI2hsbBl6skqEkOp]{owl}. While you are in the form of an @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.tI2hsbBl6skqEkOp]{owl}, you retain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.
If you are a druid with the Wild Shape feature, you can transform into a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.vYLiHfYOHm9CXs9I]{giant owl} instead. Drinking this potion doesnâ€™t expend a use of Wild Shape.
